features: TRAVEL ACCESSORIES - Each of our vacuum storage bags passes strict quality control standards and ensures long-term compressed storage. Including 2 sizes, 6 Pcs Medium (20x16)”, 6 Pcs Large (24x16)”

COMPRESSION BAGS FOR TRAVEL - Our vacuum storage bags are made of PA+PE to protect your clothes from water, air, dirt, dust, and other damage. They can store various items, including clothes, pillows, towels, bedding, shirts, pants, sweaters, blankets, etc.
HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS - Space saver bags are sealed with double zippers to prevent leakage. It can save more than 75% of storage space. Reusable, you don’t need to buy another bag.

NO NEED FOR VACUUM OR PUMP - one-way ventilation holes are provided on the centerline of the tail. Just put the clothes in the bag, and then roll the bag from the mouth of the bag to the bottom, forcing the air out through the unidirectional air outlet at the bottom of the bag. No need for any other equipment, very easy to use.
TRAVEL ESSENTIALS - Under your rational choice, ALMING products will be your golden assistant for travel, I believe it will bring you a pleasant and relaxing journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's worth it...Great buy!
reviews.reviewText: Game changer in packing. I love them!My suit case is sooo neat. Now, I didn't put items I didn't want wrinkled in them. On vacay, I keep my items in the bag. Keeps it nice & orderly. Easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Without these, we never would have made our cruise trip work with the carry on luggage
reviews.reviewText: You can jam "5 pounds of stuff in a 1 pound bag". I had the bags stuffed and my entire 180lb weight on these bags multiple times throughout our trip and am amazed at the durability and that the magical valve works the way it does. You do not need any tools or vacuum or anything but your weight to make these work. Game changer for the ultra-packer in me. Saved money and time on checking bags. Paid for themselves the first trip and not one rip or malfunction of the one-way valves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I was impressed
reviews.reviewText: The bags were very spacious and accommodated a lot of my bulky clothing. It helped me to save a lot of room in my suitcase when packing for my cruise.The only thing that was slightly confusing at first was the process to squeeze the air out of the bag so that the shrink wrap effect can take place.Other than that, this is a very helpful and useful products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: These bags are great for travel. You do not need anything other than your hands to roll up the clothes inside and it pushes the air out. Excellent for traveling too your destination or coming home from your destination. These were purchased for a friend who has a hard time organizing her suitcase. She used these and was much more successful both on her way to her destination and back. She's even looking at getting more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too big for small suitcases.
reviews.reviewText: These bags appear well-made, but they are definitely bigger than the measurements provided. I just wanted smaller bags, as I have a smaller suitcase. I sent them back and will keep looking. (For comparison, I bought the Samsonite 3-pack of 3 sizes. The medium was perfect. The small was also good, except the slider kept coming off. The large bag was larger than the base of my suitcase.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These things work amazingly. They actually do save so much room and the clothes don't come out all wrinkled. This was great to put my blanket for on the plane in. I didn't have to carry around a big blanket. Fit in my backpack and easy to put back even on the plane.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used these for travel last week and was very pleased with the space I was able to create. My clothes did not wrinkle much as I thought they would. These saved so much space in my luggage. I was able to get clothes for a week for 2 people into a medium sized suitcase with room for shoes and toiletries as well. I found the bag sizes to work just fine. I have packing cubes, but I like these vacuum bags better. I was skeptical about how compact I could make the bags by just rolling them. But it was easy and worked well, stayed sealed throughout travel and now I know they will be just right for taking to Europe to keep my luggage to a minimum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost a Necessity While Traveling
reviews.reviewText: These plastic compression bags are almost essential for traveling efficiently. I use them to keep my carryon bag tidy and keep the dirty clothes separated from the clean. The slider clip does tend to fall off, but just snap it back into place.
